name: Star-Lord
desc: Even Star-Lord disappears.

name: Pepper Potts
desc: Pepper Potts also survived.

name: Gamora
desc: Gamora had already been murdered by Thanos.

name: Okoye
desc: Okoye will want to avenge her king.

name: Shuri
desc: Shuri was previously believed to be alive.

name: Captain Marvel
desc: Captain Marvel is ready to join the team.

name: Valkyrie
desc: Valkyrie, one of Thor's major allies, also survived the snap.

name: Doctor Strange
desc: Doctor Strange seemed at peace with his own disappearance.

name: Scarlet Witch
desc: Scarlet Witch disappeared just after watching Thanos kill her boyfriend.

name: Nebula
desc: Nebula, though not technically a Guardian, also survived.

name: Vision
desc: Vision, one of the Avengers' most powerful assets, died a painful death.

name: Ant-Man
desc: Ant-Man skipped the battles in Infinity War, but he's back.

name: Drax
desc: She was closely followed by Drax.

name: Iron Man
desc: Iron Man eventually makes it back home.

name: Spider-Man
desc: Spider-Man's disappearance was one of the film's most heartbreaking scenes.

name: Hulk
desc: We may see the Hulk fight another battle.

name: Mantis
desc: Mantis was the first of the Guardians of the Galaxy to disappear.

name: War Machine
desc: War Machine fought in the Battle of Wakanda and survived the Snappening.

name: Rocket
desc: Rocket is the only Guardian who survived.

name: Groot
desc: Back on Earth, Groot also turned to dust.

name: Thor
desc: Thor has a score to settle.

name: Happy Hogan
desc: Iron Man fans will be thrilled that Happy Hogan is still around.

name: Black Panther
desc: Black Panther disappears while trying to help his friend.

name: Loki
desc: Loki was one of the first victims in Infinity War.

name: Black Widow
desc: Black Widow is sporting a similar hair color.

name: Winter Soldier
desc: The Winter Soldier fell victim to the Thanos snap.

name: Falcon
desc: Falcon disappeared in the jungle of Wakanda.

name: Captain America
desc: Captain America is ready to suit up.

name: Nick Fury's
desc: Nick Fury's disappearance was revealed in the end credits scene of Infinity War.

name: Wong
desc: Wong is an important supporting character.

name: Wasp
desc: The Wasp disappeared offscreen.

name: Hawkeye
desc: Hawkeye is back after a brief hiatus.
